Class COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.MethodInfo 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.FieldOrMethodInfo
           |
           +----COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.MethodInfo
public class MethodInfo
extends FieldOrMethodInfo
Describes a single method entry in the class file

MethodInfo(ClassFile, int, int, int)
Create a MethodInfo.

addCode(int, int, byte[], ExceptionTableEntry[], Attribute[])
Add a Code attribute to the method.

MethodInfo 
 public MethodInfo(ClassFile cf,
                   int access_flags,
                   int name_index,
                   int descriptor_index)
Create a MethodInfo.

Parameters:
cf - The ClassFile that this method will be added to
access_flags - The access flags (ACC_PUBLIC, ACC_FINAL, etc.)
name_index - UTF8 constant pool entry giving the method name
descriptor_index - UTF8 constant pool entry giving the method descriptor
See Also:
RuntimeConstants

addCode 
 public void addCode(int max_stack,
                     int max_locals,
                     byte code[],
                     ExceptionTableEntry exceptions[],
                     Attribute attributes[])
Add a Code attribute to the method. This should be done for all non-native and non-abstract methods.

Parameters:
max_stack - Maximum stack that the method may use
max_locals - Maximum parameters that the class may use
code - The code, as bytecodes. All constant pool references in the code should be found in the constant pool of the ClassFile given in the constructor
exceptions - A list of entries in the exception handler table
attributes - A list of attributes for the Code attribute
